name: level-up-marios-minigames-mayhem
story:
Have you ever watched a Mario animation on YouTube and wished that you could play it for real? Well that's exactly what this game is all about!
Features:

8 levels, with more coming in future updates!
3 green coins to find in each level!
Ranks! Try to get the highest rank on each level!
Boss battles!
Optional checkpoints and infinite lives modifiers for inexperienced players!
Re-bindable Controls!
Cheats!
